content: **this is a step-by-step photo tutorial for a simple flower there are written instructions in the usual compact format as well as a chart to keep you right ** you will need to know how to make a magic loop a handy link is given if you don t materials - small amount of any kind of yarn could be used with the appropriate size of crochet hook and a needle for sewing in ends this project is perfect for using up small amounts of left over yarn the thicker the yarn the greater the yardage required both uk and us terms are in the same pdf
